content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Mr. Li. The apartment is a great opportunity for you to live in the heart of Munich. Regarding the rental price, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. What rental price are you willing to pay monthly?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to pay the lowest price possible. I am a student and I am responsible for paying my bills. I am also dependable. Therefore, I am looking for the lowest possible price. What is the monthly rental price?
name: Bo Li from China

content: I see, thank you for your interest in the apartment. The monthly rental price for this apartment is negotiable. Based on the size of the apartment, which is 25 square meters, and your status as a student, I am willing to offer a rental price of €400 per month. This price includes all utilities and maintenance costs. Is this price acceptable to you, Mr. Li?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of €400 per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Bo Li from China

content: You're welcome, Mr. Li. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. The apartment is a great opportunity for you to live in Munich, and I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
